amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount in the bill for the National Fish and Wildlife Service by $7,537,000 and apply the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 295 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $7,537,000 the United States Fish and Wildlife Service , Resource Management.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A032) Failed by voice vote.
